column1: Coronavirus blew upon the earth a very strong wind and America's undergarment has been revealed. America is no longer the special place we think it is! It's just a glorified Nigeria with beautiful structures but a shitty justice system. Until they end systemic racism. Fvck 12
Coronavirus did that effortlessly for Months until Stupid Derek Chauvin had to murder innocent Geroge Floyd cos he was a black man.
